I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
S: Type
T: Type
x0: S
y0: T
s: seq (S * T)

Goal:
last x0 (unzip1 s) = fst (last (x0, y0) s)

Premises:
Notation seq := list
unzip1 = fun S T : Type => map fst : forall S T : Type, seq (S * T) -> seq S Arguments S, T are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope seq_scope]
last = fun T : Type => fix last (x : T) (s : seq T) {struct s} : T := match s with | [::] => x | x' :: s' => last x' s' end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope]
fst = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (x, _) := p in x : forall A B : Type, A * B -> A Arguments A, B are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope _]
zip_unzip : forall (S T : Type) (s : seq (S * T)), zip (unzip1 s) (unzip2 s) = s
size_unzip1 : forall s0 : seq (?T * ?T0), size (unzip1 s0) = size s0 where ?T : [S : Type T : Type x0 : S y0 : T s : seq (S * T) |- Type] ?T0 : [S : Type T : Type x0 : S y0 : T s : seq (S * T) |- Type]
unzip1_behead : forall s0 : seq (?S * ?T), unzip1 (behead s0) = behead (unzip1 s0) where ?S : [S : Type T : Type x0 : S y0 : T s : seq (S * T) |- Type] ?T : [S : Type T : Type x0 : S y0 : T s : seq (S * T) |- Type]
unzip1_belast : forall s0 : seq (?S * ?T), unzip1 (belast s0) = belast (unzip1 s0) where ?S : [S : Type T : Type x0 : S y0 : T s : seq (S * T) |- Type] ?T : [S : Type T : Type x0 : S y0 : T s : seq (S * T) |- Type]
unzip1_rcons : forall (s0 : seq (?S * ?T)) (h : ?S * ?T), unzip1 (rcons s0 h) = rcons (unzip1 s0) (fst h) where ?S : [S : Type T : Type x0 : S y0 : T s : seq (S * T) |- Type] ?T : [S : Type T : Type x0 : S y0 : T s : seq (S * T) |- Type]
unzip1_fst : forall s0 : seq (?S * ?T), unzip1 s0 = [seq fst i | i <- s0] where ?S : [S : Type T : Type x0 : S y0 : T s : seq (S * T) |- Type] ?T : [S : Type T : Type x0 : S y0 : T s : seq (S * T) |- Type]
last_rev : forall (x1 : ?T) (l : seq ?T), last x1 (rev l) = head x1 l where ?T : [S : Type T : Type x0 : S y0 : T s : seq (S * T) |- Type]
head_rev : forall (x1 : ?T) (l : seq ?T), head x1 (rev l) = last x1 l where ?T : [S : Type T : Type x0 : S y0 : T s : seq (S * T) |- Type]
last_nth : forall (T : Type) (x0 x : T) (s : seq T), last x s = nth x0 (x :: s) (size s)
last_map : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) (s : seq T1) (x : T1), last (f x) [seq f i | i <- s] = f (last x s)
rev_rev : forall l : seq ?T, rev (rev l) = l where ?T : [S : Type T : Type x0 : S y0 : T s : seq (S * T) |- Type]
last_cat : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s1 s2 : seq T), last x (s1 ++ s2) = last (last x s1) s2
lastI : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s : seq T), x :: s = rcons (seq.belast x s) (last x s)
last_eq : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (s : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)) (z x y : eqtype.Equality.sort T), ~~ eqtype.eq_op x y -> ~~ eqtype.eq_op z y -> eqtype.eq_op (last x s) y = eqtype.eq_op (last z s) y
last_cons : forall (T : Type) (x y : T) (s : seq T), last x (y :: s) = last y s
index_last : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (x : eqtype.Equality.sort T) (s : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)), uniq (x :: s) -> index (last x s) (x :: s) = size s
nth_last : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T), nth x0 s (Init.Nat.pred (size s)) = last x0 s
head_rcons : forall (x1 : ?T) (s0 : seq ?T) (t : ?T), head x1 (rcons s0 t) = head t s0 where ?T : [S : Type T : Type x0 : S y0 : T s : seq (S * T) |- Type]
unzip2 = fun S T : Type => map snd : forall S T : Type, seq (S * T) -> seq T Arguments S, T are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope seq_scope]
tallyEl : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (s : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)), perm_eq (unzip1 (tally (T:=T) s)) (undup s)
injective_projections : forall (A B : Type) (p1 p2 : A * B), fst p1 = fst p2 -> snd p1 = snd p2 -> p1 = p2
zip = fun S T : Type => fix zip (s : seq S) (t : seq T) {struct t} : seq (S * T) := match s with | [::] => [::] | x :: s' => match t with | [::] => [::] | y :: t' => (x, y) :: zip s' t' end end : forall S T : Type, seq S -> seq T -> seq (S * T) Arguments S, T are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope seq_scope seq_scope]
nth_rcons : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) (x : T) (n : nat), nth x0 (rcons s x) n = (if ssrnat.leq (Datatypes.S n) (size s) then nth x0 s n else if eqtype.eq_op n (size s) then x else x0)
size_zip : forall (S T : Type) (s : seq S) (t : seq T), size (zip s t) = ssrnat.minn (size s) (size t)
unzip1_zip : forall (S T : Type) (s : seq S) (t : seq T), ssrnat.leq (size s) (size t) -> unzip1 (zip s t) = s
rev_cons : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s : seq T), rev (x :: s) = rcons (rev s) x
nth0 : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T), nth x0 s 0 = head x0 s
seq.iota = fix iota (m n : nat) {struct n} : seq nat := match n with | 0%nat => [::] | S n' => m :: iota (S m) n' end : nat -> nat -> seq nat Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope]
N.sqrtrem_sqrt : forall n : N, fst (N.sqrtrem n) = N.sqrt n
Z.sqrtrem_sqrt : forall n : Z, fst (Z.sqrtrem n) = Z.sqrt n
Z.ggcd_gcd : forall a b : Z, fst (Z.ggcd a b) = Z.gcd a b
N.ggcd_gcd : forall a b : N, fst (N.ggcd a b) = N.gcd a b
Pos.ggcd_gcd : forall a b : positive, fst (Pos.ggcd a b) = Pos.gcd a b
last_rcons : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s : seq T) (z : T), last x (rcons s z) = z
BinIntDef.Z.opp = fun x : Z => match x with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos x0 => Z.neg x0 | Z.neg x0 => Z.pos x0 end : Z -> Z Argument scope is [Z_scope]
belast_cat : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s1 s2 : seq T), seq.belast x (s1 ++ s2) = seq.belast x s1 ++ seq.belast (last x s1) s2
in_cons : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (y : eqtype.Equality.sort T) (s : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)) (x : eqtype.Equality.sort T), (x \in y :: s) = eqtype.eq_op x y || (x \in s)
INR = fix INR (n : nat) : R := match n with | 0%nat => 0 | 1%nat => 1 | S (S _ as n0) => INR n0 + 1 end : nat -> R Argument scope is [nat_scope]
Zpower.Zdiv_rest_shiftr : forall (x : Z) (p : positive), fst (Zpower.Zdiv_rest x p) = Z.shiftr x (Z.pos p)
Pos.ggcdn_gcdn : forall (n : nat) (a b : positive), fst (Pos.ggcdn n a b) = Pos.gcdn n a b
